title: Lion Safari Park and Lesedi Cultural Village Tour
description: This tour package near Johannesburg includes a guided tour of Lesedi Cultural Village showcasing five South African cultural groups, traditional lunch, song and dance performance, and a visit to Lion & Safari Park for a mini safari guided by a ranger in a malaria-free zone.

title: 5 Day Sanbona Luxury Dwyka Tented Lodge
description: Dwyka Tented Lodge in Sanbona Wildlife Reserve offers luxurious, eco-friendly accommodation in a secluded horseshoe bend of a dry Karoo ravine. Each of the nine spacious tents features an en-suite bathroom, outdoor shower, private deck with a heated plunge pool, and modern amenities like air conditioning, a private minibar, and Wi-Fi. Guests can unwind in the stylish lounge, dine under the stars in the boma, or enjoy treatments at the Relaxation Retreat. The lodge combines comfort with a romantic wilderness setting, providing an unforgettable safari experience.

title: 4 Day Sanbona Luxury Dwyka Tented Lodge
description: Experience the serene wilderness of Sanbona Wildlife Reserve during a 4-day safari at the Dwyka Tented Camp. Nestled in a secluded horseshoe bend, this luxurious camp blends seamlessly into the rugged beauty of the Little Karoo. Sanbona, one of South Africa’s largest private reserves, offers a conservation-focused safari where you can encounter diverse wildlife, explore ancient San rock art, and admire unique flora. Just 3.5 hours from Cape Town, the malaria-free reserve promises a tranquil escape filled with unforgettable game drives, scenic vistas, and the charm of the Western Cape’s natural heritage.

title: Full Day Kruger Safari from Hazyview
description: Join us for a full-day guided safari in Kruger National Park, with convenient pickup from Hazyview or nearby lodges. We enter the park through Paul Kruger Gate, leading us into the renowned game-rich areas around Skukuza and Lower Sabie. These regions are known for frequent sightings of the Big Five and an abundance of wildlife along the Sabie River. With daily guaranteed departures and highly qualified guides, you’ll experience the best that Kruger has to offer in comfort and style. Lunch is at Skukuza Rest Camp, and our open 4×4 safari vehicles are designed specifically for optimal game viewing.

Enjoy guided game drives, gourmet dining, and relaxing on luxurious decks. Join this 4-day tour for a luxury experience in a spectacular setting, creating cherished memories.

We enter the park through Paul Kruger Gate, leading us into the renowned game-rich areas around Skukuza and Lower Sabie. These regions are known for frequent sightings of the Big Five and an abundance of wildlife along the Sabie River. With daily guaranteed departures and highly qualified guides, you’ll experience the best that Kruger has to offer in comfort and style. Lunch is at Skukuza Rest Camp, and our open 4×4 safari vehicles are designed specifically for optimal game viewing.

description: It’s a magical combination of three hugely popular tourist destinations in southern Africa, staying in luxury lodges in gorgeous settings.From the vibrant streets of Soweto and the somber halls of the Apartheid museum to the iconic Kruger Park region and the mighty Victoria Falls, your days are jam-packed with fascinating excursions and fun activities.

description: Your days are jam-packed with fun and outdoor adventures at two of the most popular tourist destinations in Africa.

description: Located in a malaria-free area, Madikwe has high numbers of game and low numbers of visitors with a limited selection of private safari lodges on the reserve. This means you’re guaranteed an exclusive safari experience.

title: 4 Day Madikwe Bush House Safari
description: It is stylishly decorated yet retains much of its original charm and warmth. It’s a family-friendly safari destination in the prestigious Madikwe Game Reserve which is located in a malaria-free region in the north-western corner of South Africa.

title: 3 Day Madikwe Hills Game Lodge Safari
description: Madikwe Hills is an intimate private game lodge that is elegant and sophisticated, yet warm and welcoming. Daily game drives in beautiful bushveld surrounds and exciting Big 5 sightings coupled with luxurious facilities and the undivided attention of the Madikwe Hills team; it’s a recipe for the perfect safari.

title: 2 Day Inverdoorn Luxury Safari
description: Discover luxury, wildlife, and conservation beyond the Karoo’s heartbeat at Inverdoorn Private Game Reserve! Imagine this: 2.5 hours from Cape Town’s bustle, nestled amidst the vast, malaria-free Ceres Karoo, lies Inverdoorn.

title: Inverdoorn Full Day Safari
description: The Big 5 game reserve is located in a malaria-free area, a comfortable 2-hour drive from Cape Town. It’s home to an array of animals, including a thriving coalition of cheetah.

title: 12 Apostles Scenic Flight
description: This popular helicopter flight is tailored by the operators to make it affordable at the same time as offering an exciting once-in-a-lifetime experience. Explore the Atlantic Coast, the four beaches of Clifton and the 12 Apostles mountain range from above with an experienced helicopter pilot. Our team is passionate about seeing people’s faces light up when they get an aerial view of the Mother City’s iconic natural landscapes.

title: Robben Island Scenic Flight
description: Learn more about the history of Robben Island on this special helicopter flight. With Table Mountain in the background and many incredible natural landmarks to see on the flight, this is a remarkable aerial tour of a UNESCO Heritage Site and an island rich in history.

title: Two Oceans Scenic Flight
description: The Two Oceans Scenic helicopter flight explores the Atlantic Coast and offers a 360-degree view of Table Mountain, Signal Hill and Lion’s Head after you take off from the V&A Waterfront. Beautiful coastal towns on the Cape Peninsula that you’ll see from the air include Noordhoek, Kommetjie, False Bay and Kalk Bay.

title: Cape Town Helicopter Tour - Atlantico Scenic Flight
description: The Atlantico Scenic Flight includes a private helicopter flight along the Atlantic beaches, Twelve Apostles and Hout Bay.

title: Full Peninsula Scenic Flight
description: The Full Peninsula Scenic Flight takes you on an aerial tour of the breathtakingly-beautiful Cape Peninsula. It’s our flagship helicopter tour and provides a bird’s-eye view of Cape Town’s splendid natural landmarks. Join us for an exhilarating helicopter flight that showcases Cape Town City Bowl, Atlantic Seaboard, Table Mountain National Park, the Southern Peninsula and Constantia Winelands.

title: Hopper Scenic Flight
description: The Hopper flight takes you from V&A Waterfront along the Atlantic Seaboard, with incredible sights flying of the historic Cape Town harbour and the city’s iconic mountains and the Atlantic Seaboard. The view out over the Atlantic Ocean is simply magical, with Robben Island and Blouberg in the distance.

title: It's your move Romeo Private Tour
description: This is the most romantic wine tour you can book in Cape Town. Spoil your significant other with horseback riding through beautiful vineyards and a private picnic for two. Toast with a glass of bubbly, paired with delectable nougat. Taste some of the most exquisite local wines in Stellenbosch and sample artisanal chocolate in Franschhoek.

title: Fauna, Flora and Fermentation Private Tour
description: If you like fine wine and nature, this tour is the one for you. It’s all in the name… exploring beautiful parts of the Cape Winelands, you’ll see endemic plant species and an array of wildlife and birds while enjoying panoramic views of the spectacular landscapes.

title: Gourmet Private Wine Tour
description: Our Gourmet Tour is the ultimate wine and food pairing tour in the Cape Winelands. Join a private Wine Lord for an exclusive gourmet tour in Stellenbosch. You can select four experiences to include in your itinerary.

title: Meet the Wine Makers Private Tour
description: The Meet The Wine Makers Tour is TripAdvisor’s top-rated private wine tour in Cape Town. Meet local wine makers who share their favourite fine wines with you in a private wine tasting. The wines are paired with local delicacies.

title: Classic Wine Private Tour
description: Enjoy a private wine tour in the Cape Winelands with a professional wine guide. This interesting cultural experience offers a unique opportunity to visit five premier wine estates in Stellenbosch and learn more about the complex art of wine making and wine pairings.

title: Whale, Wine and Wors Tour
description: Spend a day exploring the best that the Western Cape has to offer with a knowledgeable tour guide. Visit an award-winning wine estate in Stellenbosch, sample South Africa’s best ‘wors’, look for whales in the bay and sample fine craft beers.

title: Full Day Cape Winelands Tour
description: Paarl, Franschhoek and Stellenbosch are legendary towns that lie in the heart of the Cape Winelands. They are renowned for their outstanding beauty, heritage buildings, dramatic mountain ranges and vast rolling vineyards.

title: Half Day Cape Winelands Tour
description: The heritage town is known for its striking beauty, majestic mountains, iconic buildings and vast rolling vineyards. Our half-day tour introduces you to the Cape Winelands which offers visitors the choice of 18 official wine routes and two brandy tours.

title: Cape Agulhas Full Day tour
description: The striking lighthouse standing sentry on a rocky outcrop marks the southernmost tip of Africa and the official meeting point of the icy Atlantic Ocean and the warm Indian Ocean.

title: Shark Cage Diving Self Drive Tour
description: Prepare yourself for an incredible adventure when booking this exhilarating shark cage diving tour. Our expert team of divers, guides and researchers educate you on and introduce you to the magnificent Great White shark as well as other species that inhabit South Africa’s ocean waters.

title: Shark Diving and Viewing tour
description: If you are looking for a unique of getting up-close and personal with one of nature’s most awesome predators then look no further. African Eagle offers you the opportunity to spend a day with the Great White Sharks that inhabit the waters of the South African coastline. You will get the chance to dive in the world’s most famous Great White shark hunting ground: Gansbaai’s Shark Alley, at a only 2.5 hour drive from Cape Town.

title: Full Day Township and Robben Island Tour
description: It provides visitors with a snapshot of the turbulent history of South Africa and takes a look at how far the country has come since the brutal apartheid rule.

title: Half Day Township Tour
description: That is the simple wish of a typical township tour where visitors are encouraged to immerse themselves into the township experience.

title: Full Day Cape Highlights Tour
description: It begins with a drive through Cape Town City Bowel and along the Atlantic Seaboard which takes you through Sea Point, Clifton and Camps Bay, over a scenic mountain pass into the fishing village of Hout Bay and onto the Cape Point Nature Reserve. The return journey takes you along the False Bay coastal route to Stellenbosch; the jewel of the historic Cape Winelands region. The afternoon is spent tasting excellent wines at a premier wine estate before returning to Cape Town.

title: Full Day Cape Peninsula Tour
description: The peninsula falls within the Table Mountain National Park which is world-renowned for its incredible biodiversity.

title: Franschhoek Wine Tram Explorer Tour
description: Some of the world’s best wines are produced in South Africa and Franschhoek is home to some of the finest wine estates in the Cape Winelands. This tour gives you a taste of Franschhoek’s award-winning wines and insight into why they call the popular tourist town the “Wine & Gourmet Capital of South Africa”.

title: Cape Point Explorer
description: This day tour takes you to the famous Cape Point and the Cape of Good Hope Nature Reserve via the gorgeous seaside suburbs of the Southern Peninsula and the popular penguin colony at Boulders Beach. If you’re looking for a fun-filled day in the southernmost tip of the Cape Peninsula, this is it.

title: V&A Waterfront Harbour Cruise
description: The V&A Waterfront harbour cruise is one of the best ways to experience the oldest working harbour in South Africa.

title: V&A Waterfront Canal Cruise
description: Trade the cobbled streets of the V&A Waterfront and the busy city roads for a leisurely boat cruise along the canals that takes you from the beautiful harbour bay to the Foreshore area of the Cape Town City Bowl. The V&A Waterfront canal cruise is a fun outdoor activity for the whole family.

title: Sunset Bus tour - Summer only
description: A Sunset Bus Tour to Signal Hill is a must-do summer activity. Cape Town is one of South Africa’s most popular destinations, and in our opinion, it has everything to do with the city’s spectacular natural scenery.

title: Cape Winelands Tour
description: The Franschhoek and Stellenbosch Wine Tour is an unforgettable experience. Taste some of the finest wines produced in the Cape Winelands and learn how to perfectly pair wine varieties with chocolate, cheese and olives.

title: Mini Peninsula Tour
description: The Mini Peninsula Tour is the perfect way to explore both the bustling city and the enticing nature scenes of Cape Town. There are 14 stops along the circular route and tourist can hop on and off at any as they please.

title: Cape Town City and Table Mountain Tour
description:
The Cape Town City and Table Mountain Full Day Tour explores the vibrant Cape Town City Bowl, highlighting its rich heritage. The tour takes you  through the bustling central business district between the historic suburbs of
Oranjezicht and Tamboerskloof, with a Table Mountain tour in the afternoon. The city boasts a blend of modern residential developments, state-of-the-art office blocks, and world-class entertainment centres, making it a dynamic and cosmopolitan destination. Throughout the tour, participants will gain a glimpse into the history and cultural tapestry of Cape Town, with the added experience of ascending Table Mountain.

title: Table Mountain Full Day Hikes
description: Join us for a full-day hike with an experienced mountaineering guide to explore the iconic Table Mountain. You have the choice of three popular routes to the summit; Skeleton Gorge, Kasteelspoort and Tranquility Cracks.

title: Table Mountain Hike Via Platteklip Gorge
description: On this hike, we take the route up Platteklip Gorge to the top of Table Mountain. It’s the shortest, most popular route to the summit and a comfortable hike for those with less climbing experience. There are no vertical exposures which makes it suitable for people with a fear of heights. We take the leisurely route down to Lower Cable Station in a state-of-the-art rotating cable car.

title: Table Mountain Hike Via India Venster Route
description: Hiking to the top of Table Mountain is a rewarding challenge and a great way to avoid the Cableway crowds. The hike takes you to the summit via the more challenging India Venster route. It’s fairly strenuous but extremely rewarding. We take the leisurely route down to Lower Cable Station in a state-of-the-art rotating cable car.

title: Lions Head Sunrise or Sunset Tour
description: Lion’s Head lies nestled between the western side of Table Mountain and Signal Hill. If you’re looking up at Table Mountain from V&A Waterfront, you’ll see the small but distinct buttress directly below and to the right of the mountain.

title: Guided Kayak Tour
description: Enjoy the majestic beauty of Table Mountain, Lions Head and the Atlantic Seaboard coastline while leisurely paddling on a stable kayak in the open waters of Table Bay. We set off from the V&A Waterfront at the historic Cape Town harbour and spend 2 hours paddling along the stunning coastline of the Atlantic Seaboard which lies at the foothills of the western side of Table Mountain.

title: Gold Restaurant with Drumming
description: A 14-dish tasting menu at a popular African-themed restaurant in the heart of Cape Town and an exhilarating evening of live entertainment. Guests are treated to authentic African cuisine, an energetic display of traditional singing and dancing and a fun interactive drumming session.

title: Cape Town City Half Day Tour
description: This tour takes you from the V&A Waterfront in the historic Cape Town Harbour to the Blue Flag beaches of the Atlantic Seashore, the brightly-painted homes of Bo-Kaap and the historic landmarks in the Cape Town City Bowl. Enjoy a few hours in the company of a knowledgeable tour guide who makes the rich history of the city come alive.

title: Half Day Gospel Tour
description: The vibrant township church attracts hundreds of worshipers on Sundays, including members of the local community and overseas visitors.

title: Half Day Cape Town City Tour
description: Between the old suburbs of Oranjezicht and Tamboerskloof and the famous Cape Town Harbour.

title: 3 Day Luxury Tshukudu Bush Lodge Safari
description: Tshukudu Bush Lodge is positioned high on a rocky hill with panoramic views of the magnificent reserve and offers the perfect romantic retreat for an exclusive safari experience. Pilanesberg Game Reserve lies in the basin of an ancient volcanic crater. The extinct volcano is the perfect example of an alkaline ring complex and one of the largest of its type. The ecology of Pilanesberg is also fascinating; it lies in a transitional zone between the dry, arid Kalahari Desert and lush Lowveld and there is a lot of overlap in the richness of the reserve’s fauna and flora. Before the drive back to Johannesburg, you have the option of a game drive in a closed tour vehicle in Pilanesberg Game Reserve.

title: 3 Day Luxury Pilanesberg Private Lodge Safari
description: The private reserve has been incorporated into the Pilanesberg Game Reserve and the Black Rhino safari operators have unrestricted access to its public roads. The protected wilderness region falls within the Pilanesberg alkaline ring complex, lying at the base of an extinct volcano in a transitional zone between the arid Kalahari Desert and lush Lowveld.

title: 3 Day Luxury Kwa Maritane Bush Lodge All Inclusive Safari Package
description: It’s also located in a malaria-free region and is a comfortable 2&half-hour drive from Johannesburg. Discover what else makes Pilanesberg Game Reserve one of South Africa’s favourite Big 5 safari destinations on this popular tour.

title: 3 Day Luxury Ivory Tree Game Lodge Safari
description: South Africa’s favourite Big 5 game reserve lies in the basin of an ancient volcanic crater that forms part of a rare alkaline ring complex, and in a transitional zone between the dry Kalahari and lush Lowveld.

title: 3 Day Luxury Black Rhino Game Lodge Safari
description: The private reserve has been incorporated into the Pilanesberg and safari operators have unrestricted access to its public roads. Te Black Rhino Safari Lodge offers guests luxury accommodation and an exclusive safari experience.

title: 3 Day Luxury Bakubung Bush Lodge All Inclusive Safari Package
description: The reserve is located in a malaria-free region and that’s a large part of its attraction. Guests stay at Bakubung Bush Lodge which is one of the largest lodges in the Pilanesberg.

title: 3 Day Luxury Tented Pilanesberg Safari
description: Pilanesberg National Park, South Africa’s fourth largest game park, is situated in a crater in the Bojanala Region of the North West Province. This crater is the product of a volcano that erupted many millions of years ago. This extinct volcano has evolved to become one of the most fascinating landscapes for you to visit. By the Genesis project the majority of South Africa’s wildlife is now found in the Pilanesberg game reserve.

title: 3 Day Luxury Shepherd's Tree Game Lodge Safari
description: The popular Big 5 game reserve is located in a malaria-free region at the base of an ancient volcanic crater. It lies in a transitional zone between the dry, arid Kalahari Desert and lush Lowveld, and the wild animals have adapted well to the overlapping biospheres.

title: 2 Day Luxury Tshukudu Bush Lodge Safari
description: It’s one of the most popular Big 5 safari destinations in South Africa for this reason and because it’s renowned for its high concentration of animals and unique geology and ecology. The reserve lies within a rare alkaline ring complex at the base of an extinct volcano, and in a transitional zone between the dry, arid Kalahari Desert and lush Lowveld.

title: 2 Day Luxury Shepherd's Tree Game Lodge Safari
description: Access to the Big 5 private concession is restricted to paying guests and the safari operators while the rangers can take guests on all the public roads in the rest of the reserve in the open safari vehicles.

title: 2 Day Luxury Pilanesberg Private Lodge Safari
description: It lies at the foothills of the Pilanesberg alkaline ring complex which is one of the largest of its kind in the world. The Big 5 protected wilderness region is renowned for its high concentration of game and unique geology and ecology.

title: 2 Day Luxury Kwa Maritane Bush Lodge All Inclusive Safari Package
description: It’s located in a malaria-free region and an easy 2-hour drive from Johannesburg. It’s geared for families and large groups and offers a wide range of activities to keep everyone entertained between daily game drives, including a spectacular game viewing hide which is linked to the lodge by an underground tunnel.

title: 2 Day Luxury Ivory Tree Game Lodge Safari
description: Pilanesberg Game Reserve is renowned for its high concentration of game, prolific birdlife and unique geological location. This popular tour introduces you to the scenic wonders of Pilanesberg Game Reserve and its rich natural wonders.

title: 2 Day Luxury Black Rhino Game Lodge Safari
description: It’s also a close neighbor of Madikwe Game Reserve, and has been incorporated into the Pilanesberg Game Reserve. Black Rhino Private Game Reserve is located in a malaria-free region and less than a 3-hour drive from Johannesburg.

title: 2 Day Luxury Bakubung Bush Lodge All Inclusive Safari Package
description: It’s home to the Big 5 and a high concentration of wild animals. The ecology of the region is fascinating; the reserve lies on the floor of an ancient volcanic crater in a transitional zone between the dry, arid Kalahari Desert and the lush Lowveld region.

description: The private game reserves that make up the Greater Kruger are unfenced, and the wildlife region shares an unfenced border with the Kruger National Park. You’re guaranteed outstanding wildlife sightings while enjoying the peace and tranquility of one of the most popular Big 5 safari destinations in South Africa.

title: 5 Day Kapama Buffalo Camp Safari
description: Enjoy the ultimate Big 5 safari experience staying in luxury tented accommodation at Kapama Buffalo Camp, which is one of four exclusive properties on a 13 000-hectare private game reserve. This wildly popular 5-day luxury tented safari tour takes you to the heart of the safari capital of South Africa and promises outstanding wildlife sightings, prolific birdlife and romantic old-world charm.

title: 5 Day Kapama River Lodge Safari
description: This is a prime Big 5 safari destination located in the heart of the Greater Kruger National Park, with two perennial rivers running through the reserve that attract an abundance of game and birdlife.

description: Discover the scenic wonders of this region, staying at a dramatically revamped game lodge located in a remote part of the reserve.

title: 5 Day Imbali Lodge Safari Tour
description: The 5-day Imbali safari tour takes guests to the heart of the Kruger National Park to the Mluwati Concession. Imbali Safari Lodge is one of three luxury safari lodges in the private concession and promises guests luxurious accommodation in a spectacular setting and an outstanding safari experience.

title: 5 Day Hamiltons Luxury Tented Camp Safari
description: Staying in luxury tented accommodation that exudes ‘Out of Africa’ romance and elegance, you’re promised an outstanding safari experience with morning and afternoon game drives and a magical “sofa safari” from the privacy of your own viewing deck. Hamiltons Tented Camp is situated in pristine bushveld on a 10 000 hectare private concession which is restricted to the exclusive use of safari lodges operating in the concession.

title: 5 Day Hoyo Hoyo Lodge Safari
description: Hoyo Hoyo Safari Lodge is a luxury ecotourism destination that’s located in Mluwati Concession in central Kruger National Park. It’s architectural design isinspired by the rich cultural heritage of the local Tsonga tribe and you experience their vibrant lifestyle through its colourful décor elements, unique spa treatments and fascinating storytelling.

title: 4 Day Kapama Karula Lodge Safari
description: Enjoy an intimate Big 5 safari experience staying in stunning villas at the exclusive Kapama Karula Lodge. It’s the ultimate Big 5 destination with a distinctly modern safari experience.

title: 4 Day Kapama Buffalo Camp Safari
description: Enjoy an intimate Big 5 safari experience staying in stunning safari tented accommodation at the exclusive Kapama Buffalo Camp. It’s the ultimate safari destination where old-world romantic charm meets modern safari chic.

title: 4 Day Katekani Tented Lodge Safari
description: Guests stay in a newly-built tented lodge that’s conveniently located to the iconic Kruger National Park and the ‘safari capital’ of South Africa, the burgeoning town of Hoedspruit. Enjoy an authentic safari experience in idyllic bushveld surrounds and return to Johannesburg travelling via the world-famous Panorama Route.

description: Pilanesberg National Park, South Africa’s fourth-largest game park, is situated in a crater in the Bojanala Region of the North West Province. This crater is the product of a volcano that erupted many millions of years ago. This extinct volcano has evolved to become one of the most fascinating landscapes for you to visit. By the Genesis project, the majority of South Africa’s wildlife is now found in the Pilanesberg game reserve.

title: 3 Hour Pilanesberg Morning / Afternoon Safari Drive
description: Private vehicle with guide, including conservation fees.

title: Pilanesberg Day Tour Lunch excluded
description: Pilanesberg National Park – South Africa’s fourth largest game park is situated in a volcanic crater located within the Bojanala Region of the North West Province.

title: Ultimate Pilanesberg Open Vehicle Day Tour
description: Visit Pilanesberg Game Reserve from Johannesburg for a full-day safari. The tour includes return transportation to the park and two 2.5-hour game drives with a highly qualified ranger in an open vehicle. Search for the big 5 and other animals.

title: Rhino and Lion Park Tour
description: Don’t miss the chance to enjoy an African safari experience with the Rhino & Lion Nature Reserve right on your doorstep in Johannesburg. The protected reserve is home to crash of rhino and a variety of predators including lion, wild dog, hyena and leopard. You’ll also see the usual game like giraffe, zebra and antelope.

title: Lion Park Tour
description: The Lion & Safari Park is a 30-45-minute drive from Johannesburg, located in the historic Cradle of Humankind. It’s a protected conservation area that’s home to over 80 lions, including the famous white lions that starred in the internationally-acclaimed “The White Lion” feature film. It’s also home to cheetah, hyena, wild dogs, various antelope and a tower of tame giraffe.

title: Johannesburg Half Day Tour
description: Learn more about the political history of Johannesburg with a tour of Constitutional Hill, take a lift to the ‘Top of Africa’ at the 50-storey Carlton Centre and experience the vibrant cultural diversity of the people of Jozi.

title: 4 Hour Soweto Bicycle Tour
description: This 4-hour cultural tour of Soweto getting around on a bicycle is one of the most popular ways to experience the vibrant city. Explore Soweto with a knowledgeable tour guide; learn more about its turbulent past and discover the heart and soul of the great city as it is today.

title: 2.5 Hour Soweto Bicycle Tour
description: Explore Soweto on a bicycle for a unique cultural South African experience. The city is world-famous for its rich history and vibrant cultural diversity. From fascinating heritage tours to traditional meals at street taverns and adrenaline-packed activities, this tour offers a wide variety of entertainment for young and old.

title: 4 Hour Soweto Tuk Tuk Tour
description: Each year, thousands of people from around the world visit Soweto. A Tuk-Tuk tour is a great way to spend a day out and about in the city. Enjoy a delicious traditional lunch at the Outdoor Restaurant in the community area and meet local residents.

title: 2 Hour Soweto Tuk Tuk Tour
description: Soweto is a bustling city on the outskirts of Johannesburg that is rich in history and home to almost 2 million inhabitants. Famously home to two Nobel Peace Prize winners, the great Nelson Mandela and Archbishop Desmond Tutu, it was the epicenter of the struggle for freedom and equality in the apartheid era.

title: Soweto Night Tour
description: ONLY RUNS WEDNESDAY TO SUNDAYS

title: Soweto and Lion Park
description: This tour combines history and culture with a fun safari experience. Start in Soweto and experience the vibrant cultural diversity of South Africa and learn more about its turbulent history. End the tour at the charming Lion & Safari Park for a mini safari tour.

title: Soweto and Lunch
description: A tour of Soweto’s historic sites and lunch at a popular restaurant in the heart of Orlando West is a wonderful way to learn more about events that shaped South Africa’s turbulent past and experience the vibrant cultural diversity of the modern city.

title: 4 Day Kruger Park Treehouse Safari
description: The package includes return road transfer from Johannesburg, sunset safari drive in a 4×4 vehicle, Full day guided safari drive in the Kruger National Park, guided bush walk, 1 nights accommodation in a safari lodge and 2 nights accommodation in a Treehouse.

title: 4 Day Kruger Classic Camping Safari Tour
description: The 4-day Kruger classic camping safari tour is an opportunity to thoroughly explore the southern and central section of the iconic Kruger National Park. Discover why South Africa’s oldest and largest national park is one of the most popular safari destinations in Africa.

title: 4 Day Kruger Budget Tented Safari
description: Depart on an unforgettable safari adventure with our exclusive package,  combining the best of both worlds. Begin your journey with a night at Tremisana Game Lodge, immersing yourself in the untamed beauty of South Africa’s bushveld, followed by several nights at Marc’s Treehouse, where you can indulge in the serenity of the treetop sanctuary while exploring the  wonders of Kruger National Park.

title: 3 Day Kruger Park Tree House Safari
description: This popular 3-day budget tree house safari offers guests an authentic safari experience, staying in a one-of-a-kind treehouse at a private camp in Motlala Game Reserve. It’s a 3 000-hectare protected wildlife reserve that falls within the Greater Kruger and is less than an hour’s drive from the iconic Kruger National Park.

title: 3 Day Kruger Classic Camping Safari Tour
description: The Kruger National Park is well-known for its incredible biodiversity as well as its rich cultural history. This tour provides a brief glimpse of an outstanding wilderness region that is part of the internationally designated Kruger2Canyons UNESCO Man and Biosphere Reserve.

title: 3 Day Kruger Budget Tented Safari
description: The lodge is located in Motlala Game Reserve which forms part of the Greater Kruger National Park.

title: 2 Day Kruger Classic Camping Safari
description: On this 2-day Kruger Classic Camping Safari Tour,  guests stay in spacious 2-man Meru safari tents that are equipped for comfort and convenience. Dining under the stars around a camping firepit makes it an authentic safari experience.

title: Full Day Hluhluwe Imfolozi Park Safari Tour
description: The tour takes you on a scenic drive up the north coast of Durban to the game reserve; with beautiful views of the sparkling Indian Ocean on one side and swathes of lush, fertile sugarcane plantations on the other side.

title: Full Day Drakensberg World Heritage Tour
description: Enjoy a 3-kilometre hike to a cave adorned with Bushmen paintings, followed by a delicious lunch at the resort. The return trip takes you to the Nelson Mandela Capture Site which commemorates a significant moment in South Africa’s history.

title: Full Day Isandlwana Rorkes Drift Battlefields Tour
description: This full day tour takes you on a fascinating journey through the lush countryside to the battlefields of Isandlwana and Rorke’s Drift. A knowledge guide will regale tales of heroism on both sides and bring to life the struggles and tribulations of soldiers who fought for country and honour.

title: Full Day Durban Highlights Tour
description: Travel from Durban’s famous Golden Mile which is a revitalized beachfront promenade to the heart of the city’s central business district.

title: Full Day Sani Pass and Lesotho Tour
description: A full day Sani Pass and Lesotho Tour is a great way to experience the beauty of the Drakensberg Mountains and the unique culture of Lesotho. It is a chance to explore an entirely new section of Kwa-Zulu Natal, which, during the winter months (May through September), can transform into a snowy winter wonderland. The Sani Pass is an adventurous mountain pass that connects South Africa and Lesotho. It is located in the West of KwaZulu-Natal, on the road between Himeville and Mokhotlong and crosses the Drakensberg Mountains by means of a gravel track with steep gradients and sharp hairpins, requiring a 4×4 vehicle and an experienced driver to navigate. At the top of the pass, you can find the Sani Mountain Lodge, which claims to have the highest pub in Africa.

title: Full Day Shakaland Tour
description: Zulu people make up the largest ethnic group in South Africa, with about 10 million Zulu residents living in Kwa-Zulu Natal. A tour of Shakaland provides visitors with a glimpse of daily village life and unique cultural experiences; from exuberant tribal dancing to visits to a traditional sangoma (spiritual leader) and an inyanga (traditional herbalist).

title: Half Day uShaka Marine World Tour
description: From getting wild and wet at the water park to “meeting the creeps”, diving with sharks and ziplining over the turtle enclosure; uShaka Marine World has earned its reputation as a world-class edutainment centre.

title: Half Day Durban City Tour
description: Travel from Durban’s famous Golden Mile which is a revitalized beachfront promenade to the heart of the city’s central business district.

title: Elephant Sanctuary Tour
description: Would you like to bond with an elephant? Get really close-up and personal?

title: Lion Park and Pretoria Tour
description: In the morning we head out to the Lion Park. Our registered tour guide takes you on a tour through the Lion Park, a natural habitat only 45 minutes drive from Johannesburg. The park is home to more than 85 lions and other carnivores like the cheetah, hyena and wild dog.
